channel.title: CVE Feed for Spiffy Plugins -- WP Flow Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spiffy Plugins -- WP Flow Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-49695|2024-10-24T13:38:23.198Z -- spiffy%20plugins -- wp%20flow%20plus
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins WP Flow Plus allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Flow Plus: from n/a through 5.2.3.
